data.actual_result: The notes field is selected. This doesn't happen if you do it again without reopening the profile screen or scrolling down.
data.expected_result: The area you tapped is selected.
data.short_description: Tapping anywhere on profile page goes to the notes section the first time you tap the screen when a note is written
data.steps_to_repro: - Write a note on someone's profile - Open the profile screen for that user - Tap anywhere on the screen outside of the notes field
